page.title: 12Sutton Manor Colliery cont.
page.content: is going to bbe harnessed, processed, and sold to ICI at a price which may well return a larger profit than the sales of coal!!! Some of the methane is used in special boilers which drive the winders, but when the electric winders are introduced, the gas will be just used for heating. A whole new complex control room will be built and the conveyors will now be controlled from the surface. The processes the miners follow at Sutton are similar to those elsewhere.Clothes are changed in a shower block. In the lamp room a lead-acid battery,lamp, emergency breathing apparatus and two 'tallies' are collected. The tallies have a personal number stamped on them. Miners are then searched at the pit bank by the 'banksman' who searches
